mapper.select: SELECT user_name, user_pass FROM USER_PASS WHERE user_name = #{user_name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_PASS ( user_id, user_name, user_pass ) VALUES (nextval('user_id'), #{user_name}, #{user_pass})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_PASS SET user_pass = #{user_pass} WHERE user_name = #{user_name}
